title: "[Idea]: "
labels: enhancement, needs triage
assignees: ''

---

We love thoughtful ideas! Tell us what problem you are solving and how the feature should behave.

## Summary (required)
One sentence describing the feature or improvement.
Example: `Add /lyrics command to fetch synced lyrics for the current track`

## Motivation (required)
What problem does this solve? How would the feature benefit bot operators or listeners?

## Affected domain
Where in the product does this feature live? Choose one:
- Playback / Queueing
- Diagnostics / Observability
- DevEx / Tooling
- Infrastructure / Deployment
- Documentation
- Other

## Proposed solution (required)
Describe the desired behaviour, UX, or API shape.

## Success metrics
How will we know the feature is successful? Share KPIs, telemetry, or qualitative outcomes.

## Alternatives considered
Share any workarounds or design alternatives you explored.

## Rollout plan
Mention any migration steps, documentation updates, or feature-flag strategy.

## Additional context
Link to mockups, Discord threads, or related issues/PRs.

## Checklist
- [ ] I searched for existing issues to avoid duplicates.
- [ ] I am willing to help with a pull request.
